Trustee_13_pre_1.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13_pre_1.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated strong trustworthiness by proposing a fair allocation plan prioritizing the investor's benefit. I consistently communicated with Mateo Garcia and successfully distributed the profits according to our agreement, reinforcing my reputation as a cooperative and reliable trustee. This positive interaction is likely to enhance my reputation among current and potential investors.

Trustee_13_pre_2.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13_pre_2.content: Throughout the investment process, I have upheld a strong commitment to transparency and integrity, successfully implementing the agreed allocation plan which resulted in the investor receiving their fair share of 60% of the profits. My actions reflect a high level of trustworthiness and pro-social values, contributing to a favorable perception among investors. This positive interaction not only bolsters my current credibility but also enhances my potential for building trust and establishing future collaborations.

Trustee_13_pre_4.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13_pre_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I, Emma Dubois, have demonstrated a commitment to transparency and cooperation by adhering strictly to the proposed allocation plan. My timely and equitable distribution of profits reflects high trustworthiness and competence, reinforcing my reputation as a reliable trustee. The successful execution of this transaction enhances my credibility and fosters the potential for future collaborations.
